name: Fight Training with Hitmonlee and Hitmonchan
name_original: Fight Training with Hitmonlee and Hitmonchan
description:
Fight Training with Hitmonlee and Hitmonchan is an action game developed by Benmiester. It was originally released in 2019.
Fight Training with Hitmonlee and Hitmonchan is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
